description: Domine was designed, tested and optimized for body text on the web. It shines at 14 and 16 px. Domine is a perfect choice for newspapers or magazines websites, where text is the main focus.
designer: Pablo Impallari, Rodrigo Fuenzalida, Brenda Gallo
license_description: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
